page.title: 02CHILDRENS HOME LIFE
page.content: My home is very big because I live in a court. My bedroom is full of toys. I have got a beanbag and a great big teddy. I help my Mum to do the cooking and I make my own bed. We went strawberry picking yesterday and had strawberries and cream last night. ______________________________________ I live in a flat. I am 7. My Mum is 30 years old. My brother is 10. We have a rabbit, its name is Chalky. Every evening I play school with my dolls. My favourite tea is baked beans and potatoes. (age 7) ______________________________________ My Mummy is always in bed, now she is in hospital. I have to help my Dad so he won't lose his job. I make the beds and help to cook the dinner. When my Daddy is at work my Granny comes to look after me. (age 7)
